feed.title: Lindsay Lohan Begged Lorne Michaels for SNL Spot
feed.subtitle: Lindsay Lohan says she landed a guest spot on Saturday Night Live after “harassing” the show’s Lorne Michaels.

link.title: Lindsay Lohan Begged Lorne Michaels for SNL Spot
Lindsay Lohan Begged Lorne Michaels for SNL Spot

entry.title: Lindsay Lohan Begged Lorne Michaels for SNL Spot

link.Abstract: Lindsay Lohan says she landed a guest spot on Saturday Night Live after “harassing” the show’s Lorne Michaels.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: “I’m really lucky because Lorne Michaels has really… he’s really been supportive of me. I actually went and emailed him and kind of was harassing him to meet with him and (ask him to) let me do the show. And he believes in me and so it’s just a process and I’m willing to go through that process and prove that I can be accountable," Lindsay Lohan told Jimmy Fallon.
link.title: “I’m really lucky because Lorne Michaels has really… he’s really been supportive of me. I actually went and emailed him and kind of was harassing him to meet with him and (ask him to) let me do the show. And he believes in me and so it’s just a process and I’m willing to go through that process and prove that I can be accountable," Lindsay Lohan told Jimmy Fallon.

link.Abstract: "[Partying is] not my thing anymore," Lohan told host Matt Lauer in an interview airing Thursday.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan Claims She's Done Partying

link.Abstract: According to TMZ, Lindsay Lohan is giving Saturday Night Live free reign this weekend.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan Says Nothing is Off-Limits for SNL

link.Abstract: Lindsay Lohan’s latest court visit proved the actress is meeting the terms of her probation. According to the judge, she’s “in the home stretch” of her sentence.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan Passes Probation Hearing, in ‘Home Stretch’ of Probation

link.Abstract: While attending an amfAR gala in New York, Lindsay Lohan asked a "Canadian financier" to buy her a $20,000 watch. He laughed her request off, according to reports.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan Acts Like Charity Case at amfAR Gala

link.Abstract: According to a lawsuit, Lindsay Lohan allegedly drove a rented Maserati into a woman pushing a stroller.
link.title: Nanny Sues Lindsay Lohan Over Alleged Hit-and-Run

link.Abstract: Actress Lindsay Lohan made another appearance in court Jan. 17, 2012, this time for a progress report hearing after pleading no contest to a misdemeanor count of theft involving a necklace in Los Angeles, Calif.
link.title: Photos: Lindsay Lohan Back in Court

link.Abstract: According to reports, Lindsay Lohan may be coming north.
link.title: Could Canada Prevent Lindsay Lohan from Playing Elizabeth Taylor?

link.Abstract: Follow Dose.ca on Twitter
link.title: Follow Dose.ca on Twitter

content.div:
When Lindsay Lohan appeared on the Today Show this week, she told Matt Lauer that she’s ready to revive her career. "I've certainly seen a lot, and I've grown," Lohan said on the program. "I've just kind of, I've learned how to live my life in a way that I'm happy. And I can do the things that I want to do."

One of those things happens to be a highly coveted guest appearance on Saturday Night Live. Lohan will host this Saturday’s episode, and last night, the Mean Girls star told Jimmy Fallon how she landed the gig. Apparently she just asked the show’s executive producer, Lorne Michaels. Repeatedly.

“I kept asking him,” she said. “I wasn’t giving up.” And when she ran into Michaels in L.A., Lohan says the SNL honcho offered her the job on the spot. “You know Lorne, he’s very straight to the point,” Lohan told Fallon. “He was like, ‘What about March 3?’ I’m like, ‘I’m free!’”

She continued: “I’m really lucky because Lorne Michaels has really… he’s really been supportive of me. I actually went and emailed him and kind of was harassing him to meet with him and (ask him to) let me do the show. And he believes in me and so it’s just a process and I’m willing to go through that process and prove that I can be accountable.

“I want to poke fun at myself… I think if I’m going to do a sketch about X or Y, this is the place to do it.”

While Lohan says she’s open to poking fun at her past troubles, she has her limits. During her Today Show interview, Lohan said that she’ll be running her SNL jokes past her lawyer first. The actress explained: “I spoke with my attorney and asked her (because) I didn’t want to be disrespectful to my judge because she’s been really wonderful to me and helped with a lot. So I’ve asked if certain things would be inappropriate or off-limits because I wanted to be in the clear. Some of the things were acceptable and so we’ll see if we can get them together and write them the right way.”

I wonder if the judge likes Debbie Downer sketches? On one of her past SNL episodes, Lohan co-starred with Jimmy Fallon in a Debbie Downer skit, and Lohan took advantage of her time on Fallon’s show by asking the host if he’d join her on this week’s SNL. Will we see a cameo from the funnyman? Saturday Night Live airs March 3 on Global at 11:30 p.m. ET.

entry.title: Photos: Lindsay Lohan Back in Court

link.Abstract: Actress Lindsay Lohan made another appearance in court Jan. 17, 2012, this time for a progress report hearing after pleading no contest to a misdemeanor count of theft involving a necklace in Los Angeles, Calif.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Lindsay Lohan sits in court for her probation update hearing with her attorney Shawn Chapman Holley, left, at the Airport Courthouse, Tuesday, January 17, 2012, in Los Angeles, California. Los Angeles Superior Judge Stephanie Sautner said Lohan had met her required 12 sessions of community service at the L.A. County morgue and mandatory therapy sessions and is on pace to end probation in March if she completes her 60 days of community service.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan

link.Abstract: "Just keep doing what you're doing, and you appear to be doing it well," Los Angeles Superior Court Judge Stephanie Sautner told Lohan at the hearing.
link.title: Lindsay Lohan "doing well" on probation

link.Abstract: According to reports, Lindsay Lohan may be coming north.
